price: 30. Es de Salomón y dice: ‘En el nombre de Al-lah, el Clemente, el Misericordioso.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: innahu min sulaymāna wa-innahu bis'mi al-lahi al-raḥmāni al-raḥīmi
